descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Isaiah Thomas explains what went wrong on the Lakers' final possession when he missed the potential game-winning shot in Los Angeles' loss to Miami.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Thomas makes no excuses for missed late shot) 2018/03/16

videos.headline: Thomas makes no excuses for missed late shot
